mapper.select: select id, bonuspt_balance, bonuspt_cumulative, is_active, login_name, login_mobile, membership_no, password, qq_id, qq_pwd, sms_pwd, sms_verify_code_time, wechat_id, wechat_pwd, weibo_id, weibo_pwd, user_profile_id, create_by, create_date, del_flag, remarks, update_by, update_date, version from test.sys_user where id = #{id}

select id, bonuspt_balance, bonuspt_cumulative, is_active, login_name, login_mobile, membership_no, password, qq_id, qq_pwd, sms_pwd, sms_verify_code_time, wechat_id, wechat_pwd, weibo_id, weibo_pwd, user_profile_id, create_by, create_date, del_flag, remarks, update_by, update_date, version from test.sys_user limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into test.sys_user(bonuspt_balance, bonuspt_cumulative, is_active, login_name, login_mobile, membership_no, password, qq_id, qq_pwd, sms_pwd, sms_verify_code_time, wechat_id, wechat_pwd, weibo_id, weibo_pwd, user_profile_id, create_by, create_date, del_flag, remarks, update_by, update_date, version) values (#{bonusptBalance}, #{bonusptCumulative}, #{isActive}, #{loginName}, #{loginMobile}, #{membershipNo}, #{password}, #{qqId}, #{qqPwd}, #{smsPwd}, #{smsVerifyCodeTime}, #{wechatId}, #{wechatPwd}, #{weiboId}, #{weiboPwd}, #{userProfileId}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{version})

insert into test.sys_user(bonuspt_balance, bonuspt_cumulative, is_active, login_name, login_mobile, membership_no, password, qq_id, qq_pwd, sms_pwd, sms_verify_code_time, wechat_id, wechat_pwd, weibo_id, weibo_pwd, user_profile_id, create_by, create_date, del_flag, remarks, update_by, update_date, version) values
(#{entity.bonusptBalance}, #{entity.bonusptCumulative}, #{entity.isActive}, #{entity.loginName}, #{entity.loginMobile}, #{entity.membershipNo}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.qqId}, #{entity.qqPwd}, #{entity.smsPwd}, #{entity.smsVerifyCodeTime}, #{entity.wechatId}, #{entity.wechatPwd}, #{entity.weiboId}, #{entity.weiboPwd}, #{entity.userProfileId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createDate}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateDate}, #{entity.version})

insert into test.sys_user(bonuspt_balance, bonuspt_cumulative, is_active, login_name, login_mobile, membership_no, password, qq_id, qq_pwd, sms_pwd, sms_verify_code_time, wechat_id, wechat_pwd, weibo_id, weibo_pwd, user_profile_id, create_by, create_date, del_flag, remarks, update_by, update_date, version) values
(#{entity.bonusptBalance}, #{entity.bonusptCumulative}, #{entity.isActive}, #{entity.loginName}, #{entity.loginMobile}, #{entity.membershipNo}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.qqId}, #{entity.qqPwd}, #{entity.smsPwd}, #{entity.smsVerifyCodeTime}, #{entity.wechatId}, #{entity.wechatPwd}, #{entity.weiboId}, #{entity.weiboPwd}, #{entity.userProfileId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createDate}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateDate}, #{entity.version})
on duplicate key update bonuspt_balance = values(bonuspt_balance) , bonuspt_cumulative = values(bonuspt_cumulative) , is_active = values(is_active) , login_name = values(login_name) , login_mobile = values(login_mobile) , membership_no = values(membership_no) , password = values(password) , qq_id = values(qq_id) , qq_pwd = values(qq_pwd) , sms_pwd = values(sms_pwd) , sms_verify_code_time = values(sms_verify_code_time) , wechat_id = values(wechat_id) , wechat_pwd = values(wechat_pwd) , weibo_id = values(weibo_id) , weibo_pwd = values(weibo_pwd) , user_profile_id = values(user_profile_id) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_date = values(create_date) , del_flag = values(del_flag) , remarks = values(remarks) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_date = values(update_date) , version = values(version)
mapper.update:
update test.sys_user
bonuspt_balance = #{bonusptBalance},
bonuspt_cumulative = #{bonusptCumulative},
is_active = #{isActive},
login_name = #{loginName},
login_mobile = #{loginMobile},
membership_no = #{membershipNo},
password = #{password},
qq_id = #{qqId},
qq_pwd = #{qqPwd},
sms_pwd = #{smsPwd},
sms_verify_code_time = #{smsVerifyCodeTime},
wechat_id = #{wechatId},
wechat_pwd = #{wechatPwd},
weibo_id = #{weiboId},
weibo_pwd = #{weiboPwd},
user_profile_id = #{userProfileId},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_date = #{createDate},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
remarks = #{remarks},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_date = #{updateDate},
version = #{version},
where id = #{id}
